snippet: Misclassifying workers as independent contractors harms the employees and costs billions in lost tax revenue.
abstract: Op-Ed article by historian Marjorie Elizabeth Wood warns of trend of companies misclassifying workers as independent contractors in order to avoid paying taxes and providing benefits; calls for the right to bargain collectively to be added to Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 so that workers can be empowered under the law to fight back.
lead_paragraph: Misclassifying workers as independent contractors harms the employees and costs billions in lost tax revenue.
